WebResource.Name: tc_/Core/autocomplete.html
WebResource.Description: Provides an autocomplete text input control that can be configured to replace an existing text input on a form. The control updates the value of the provided attribute when it changes, and automatically hides controls belonging to it. Requires two parameters: field: The name of the attribute to replace/update url: The REST url that returns options for autocompletion in JSON format ex. https://crmdev.tc.gc.ca:8082/NASDS/Sites?$select=LOCATION&$filter=startswith(LOCATION, ' The end will be appended with the search term followed by the "')" characters.
